attributes.action: To stop weaponry and money aid to Ukraine and push for peace talks
attributes.additional_details: We need our Uk government to invest more into its own country and aim for peace as that’s what best for humanity and future generations
attributes.background: Stop aiding Ukraine with money and weaponry and start pushing for peace talks that can end the conflict

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Stop spending taxpayer money to support Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/654923

Seek to start peace talks between Russia and Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/656025
